title: Write five sentences which makes you feel proud and happy? - Quora

response.answer_text: That am born in India.I am the only girl in my family who has completed the bachelor studies and currently working in an IT firm and that too away from my hometown in Mumbai. Thanks to my father who always supports me.My father made me independent at very early stage of life. Irrespective of me being a girl, he treated me like a boy and never distinguished between me and my brother.The fact that he is proud of me, fills me with more enthusiasm and encourages me to do many more things.I have got really gems when talking about friends. I am really grateful that i have them.The fact that he is proud of me, fills me with more enthusiasm and encourages me to do many more things.I am gonna be the first one in my family to travel abroad.(Very soon).. . . Happy Reading.

I am grateful to my parents for bringing me in this beautiful world.I have a roof over my head.I have food to eat.I have clothes to wear.I have a beautiful family to live with.What else I would ask to you Maa- papa, this is enough! And this makes me proud of my parents. NOW It's Time to repay them. Love you Maa- Papa!
